channel.title: Comments on: Going (Semi) Offline
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: And kila... you're far far from being a סוציומט
item.content:encoded: And kila… you’re far far from being a סוציומט

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
rom: Well, now you know most why I'm offline
kila: I was never good at concentrating on my work so IM was OK for me. I even liked being able to talk to people when I felt like it. I decided to go offline to see what the consequences are, without having a good enough "reason" for it. For now I don't miss it as much as I thought I would.
item.content:encoded:
rom: Well, now you know most why I’m offline

kila: I was never good at concentrating on my work so IM was OK for me. I even liked being able to talk to people when I felt like it. I decided to go offline to see what the consequences are, without having a good enough “reason” for it. For now I don’t miss it as much as I thought I would.

item.title: By: kila
item.dc:creator: kila
item.description: I hate using IM - prefer email or phone if faster sorting out is needed, because: I type slow and hate my grammar mistakes. Messages get overlapped. The worse is that It throws you out of focus and knocks your concentration away. What can I say, I'm a סוציומט :) Wish you a good offline going...
item.content:encoded:
I hate using IM – prefer email or phone if faster sorting out is needed, because:
I type slow and hate my grammar mistakes.
Messages get overlapped.
The worse is that It throws you out of focus and knocks your concentration away.
What can I say, I’m a סוציומט :)
Wish you a good offline going…

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: I wondered why are you offline all the day, but i assumed you are just busy :)
item.content:encoded: I wondered why are you offline all the day, but i assumed you are just busy :)

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... that's not fair... the computer on which I get notifications is not the same one I'm working on. Also, I'm not always in my cubicle to see the notifications. 6 minutes is actually fanatic :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… that’s not fair… the computer on which I get notifications is not the same one I’m working on. Also, I’m not always in my cubicle to see the notifications. 6 minutes is actually fanatic :)

item.title: By: Doron Hirsch
item.dc:creator: Doron Hirsch
item.description: hmmm, 6 minutes for a ping reply....

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) I still get email notifications for comments in the blog, so... pong
item.content:encoded: :) I still get email notifications for comments in the blog, so… pong
